stories.text:
Greetings,

When I am booting my device, I end up with a black screen.

I can still access some files when I hit ctrl + F1 and I access a kind of terminal…

Is there a way where I can just reinstall Ubuntu from scratches, given that I cannot boot thru USB either on this device…?
stories.title: Ubuntu Black Screen
AWS puts latest homebrew ‘Graviton 3’ Arm CPU in production

stories.text:
(If you are burned out and want one)

I was burned out and recently left my job to take a sabbatical. I have talked to other people who are burned out but aren't taking a sabbatical. I am trying to figure out what the blockers are for taking a sabbatical. Financials? Leaving equity on the table? Not knowing if a sabbatical would help? Anxiety about not getting a job after you are done with the sabbatical?

I am single, young, hirable (software engineer) and have good savings. That made it easier for me.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's preventing you from taking a sabbatical?
